docs_row.name: Get_Seat_Map
docs_row.func_description: Get the seat map for a specific flight.

offerToken.description: offerToken can be retrieved from api/v1/flights/searchFlights(Search Flights) or api/v1/flights/searchFlightsMultiStops(Search Flights Multi Stops) endpoints in Flights collection as offerToken.

currency_code.description: The currency code. currency_code can be retrieved from api/v1/meta/getCurrency(Get Currency) endpoint in Hotels collection.

offerToken.description: offerToken can be retrieved from api/v1/flights/searchFlights(Search Flights) or api/v1/flights/searchFlightsMultiStops(Search Flights Multi Stops) endpoints in Flights collection as offerToken.

currency_code.description: The currency code. currency_code can be retrieved from api/v1/meta/getCurrency(Get Currency) endpoint in Hotels collection.

enhanced_parameters.offerToken: Unique token identifying a flight offer, obtained from flight search endpoints.
enhanced_parameters.currency_code: Currency for displaying seat prices and fees.
